# influxdb_bucket (Resource)

InfluxDB bucket resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "influxdb_bucket" "example" {
  name        = "my-bucket"
  description = "Example bucket created by Terraform"
}

resource "influxdb_bucket" "with_retention" {
  name             = "retention-bucket"
  description      = "Bucket with 30-day retention"
  retention_seconds = 2592000  # 30 days
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Bucket name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Bucket description
- `org` (String) Organization name or ID. If not provided, uses the provider default.
- `retention_seconds` (Number) Data retention period in seconds. 0 means infinite retention. Defaults to 0 (infinite).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Bucket ID
